thoughts: Is startled to find {PRONOUN/m_c/self} wading in the muck of a shadowed forest

Is distraught at the sight of this dark place

Wonders if there's still a way for {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to teach things to others, even from here
Can't believe {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}'ll never get to hunt again
Takes a look at the dark surroundings and wonders if there'll be any prey in a place like this

Runs around desperately, trying to understand what this place is and where the stars are

Is shocked to be in the Dark Forest, but knows {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} can fight if necessary
Wonders if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} can climb {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way out of this dark place {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} appeared in
Climbs up high into a tree to hide, distraught after finding {PRONOUN/m_c/self} in the Dark Forest

Tries to convince every cat around that there was a mistake, and {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} shouldn't be here

Doesn't miss the shadowy figures gathering around {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in curiosity... or worse

Sadly realizes this might not be the best place to possibly visit kits' dreams from
